formatted_address: F-02 15&16 Level 2, 2F, Fisherman Wharf Island, 1, Jln Forest City - Lebuhraya Tanjung Pelepas, forest city, 81550 Gelang Patah, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Kampung Carabao Thai Restaurant @Forest City

ğŸ‘‰Egg Omeletteâ­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ - A must-have pairing with Tom Yam, fluffy and just right. It complements the spiciness perfectly. ğŸ³ğŸ’›

Such an amazing experience overall, every dish was flavorful and delicious! Highly recommend. ğŸ˜Š
All foods are delicious, staff are attentive too. I ordered Sweet and Sour Fish, Stir fried lady finger with garlic, Chicken Tom Yum Soup and Crispy Kang Kong

come here many times, always order tomyam, fried rice kampong, prawn omelette. portiom very big, so tasty, delicious. i stay at forest city, i think this is the best restaurant so far. location above marry brown and mixue. easy to find. same floor as duty free wine shop

The restaurant was located near to the sea. Nice view with a great food. Big portion of food worth with the price given. Hopefully they get an Halal certificate to attract Muslim, because some of us feel unsure if they put No pork and lad only.

The tom yam seafood is nice, not too spicy and not too sour, put quite a bit of blue ginger to enhance the taste, served hot and the fire kept the soup hot for a reasonable time for me to slowly enjoy the hot tom yam soup.

vicinity: F-02 15&16 Level 2, 2F, Fisherman Wharf Island, 1, Jalan Forest City - Lebuhraya Tanjung Pelepas, forest city, Gelang Patah
